findings.title: Block gas limit
findings.description: add(uint256 _allocPoint, …), set(uint256 _pid, …) and updateEmissionRate() could invoke massUpdatePools() function, that can fail due to block gas limit if the pool size is too big.

findings.title: add function issue
findings.description: If some LP token is added to the contract twice using function add, then the total amount of reward in function updatePool will be incorrect.

findings.title: Owner Privileges Can Drain Tokens
findings.description: The owner has privileges to drain tokens sent to the referral contract which is useful for withdrawing tokens sent by mistake to the contract.

findings.title: Owner privileges can change the operator of the referral contract.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the operator of the referral contract, which could lead to unauthorized access and potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner privileges can change the referral commission rate.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the referral commission rate, which could lead to unintended consequences.
